sys_update_xml.name: cmdb_identifier_b6cc8e1bfc9b01107f44b686498405a9
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="cmdb_identifier"><cmdb_identifier action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_to>u_cmdb_ci_jboss_wildfly_module_entry_point</applies_to><description/><independent>true</independent><name>JBoss WildFly Module Entry Point rule</name><sys_class_name>cmdb_identifier</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-11 21:42:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>b6cc8e1bfc9b01107f44b686498405a9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>u_cmdb_ci_jboss_wildfly_module_entry_point</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>cmdb_identifier_b6cc8e1bfc9b01107f44b686498405a9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-11 21:42:31</sys_updated_on></cmdb_identifier></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sa_pattern_211f2789786301107f444a5dfb8dfa81
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sa_pattern"><sa_pattern action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><ci_type>u_cmdb_ci_jboss_wildfly</ci_type><cpattern_type>1</cpattern_type><description/><directory>false</directory><enforce_proc_classy>false</enforce_proc_classy><invoke_per_account>false</invoke_per_account><metadata_id>211f2789786301107f444a5dfb8dfa81</metadata_id><name>JBoss WildFly Pattern</name><ndl>pattern {
	metadata {
		id = "211f2789786301107f444a5dfb8dfa81"
		name = "JBoss WildFly Pattern"
		description = ""
		citype = "u_cmdb_ci_jboss_wildfly"
	}
	identification {
		name = "Identification for JBoss WildFly Web Site (war)"
		entry_point {type = "cmdb_ci_endpoint_http"}
		find_process_strategy {strategy = LISTENING_PORT}
		step {
			name = "Match JBoss WildFly command line"
			match {
				contains {
					get_attr {"process.commandLine"}
					"jboss.server.base"
				}
				terminate_op = terminate
				terminate_msg = ""
			}
		}
		step {
			name = "Set installation directory"
			set_attr {
				"install_directory"
				get_attr {"process.environmentVariables.JBOSS_HOME.value"}
			}
		}
		step {
			name = "Set base_dir"
			parse_var_to_var {
				from_var_name = "process.commandLine"
				to_var_names = "base_dir"
				parsing_strategy = cmdline_linux_parsing {after_option = "jboss.server.base.dir"}
				if_not_found_do = nop {}
			}
		}
		step {
			name = "Set configuration directory"
			set_attr {
				"config_directory"
				concat {
					get_attr {"base_dir"}
					"/configuration"
				}
			}
		}
		step {
			name = "Set configuration file name"
			parse_var_to_var {
				from_var_name = "process.commandLine"
				to_var_names = "config_file"
				parsing_strategy = cmdline_linux_parsing {after_option = "-c"}
				if_not_found_do = nop {}
			}
		}
		step {
			name = "Set configuration file full path"
			set_attr {
				"config_file"
				concat {
					get_attr {"config_directory"}
					"/"
					get_attr {"config_file"}
				}
			}
		}
		step {
			name = "Set version"
			runcmd_to_var {
				cmd = concat {
					"sh "
					get_attr {"install_directory"}
					"/bin/standalone.sh -v || :"
				}
				execution_mode = "DEFAULT"
				var_names = "version"
				parsing_strategy = regex_parsing {regex = "WildFly.*?([\\d\\.]+)\\."}
				if_not_found_do = nop {}
				cache_flag = 0
			}
		}
		step {
			name = "Set name"
			set_attr {
				"name"
				concat {
					"JBoss WildFly "
					get_attr {"version"}
				}
			}
		}
		step {
			name = "Get all deployment from config file"
			parse_text_file_to_var {
				file_path = get_files_by_filter {
					expression = get_attr {"config_file"}
					foreach_attribute_name = "forEach"
				}
				var_names = table {
					name = "deployments"
					col_names = "sha1","name"
				}
				parsing_strategy = xml_parsing_strategy {
					rootXpath = "/server"
					fields {
						field {
							col_name = "sha1"
							xpath = "/server/deployments/deployment/content/@sha1"
							delimiters = ""
							position = 1
						}
						field {
							col_name = "name"
							xpath = "/server/deployments/deployment/@name"
							delimiters = ""
							position = 1
						}
						field {
							col_name = "forEach"
							for_each = "forEach"
							delimiters = ""
							position = 1
						}
					}
				}
				if_not_found_do = nop {}
				cache_flag = 0
			}
		}
		step {
			name = "Parse entry point"
			parse_url_to_var {
				from_var_name = "entry_point.url"
				to_var_name = "ep_url"
				if_not_found_do = nop {}
			}
		}
		step {
			name = "Remove slash from path"
			set_attr {
				"path_from_ep"
				eval {"String res = ${ep_url[1].path};res = res.replaceAll(\"/\", \"\");return res;"}
			}
		}
		step {
			name = "Filter deployment table"
			filter {
				src_table_name = "deployments"
				target_table_name = "deployments"
				condition = eq {
					get_attr {"deployments[].name"}
					concat {
						get_attr {"path_from_ep"}
						".war"
					}
				}
			}
		}
		step {
			name = "Validate deployment table is not empty"
			match {
				all {
					is_not_empty {get_attr {"deployments"}}
					is_empty {get_attr {"deployments[2].name"}}
				}
				terminate_op = terminate
				terminate_msg = ""
			}
		}
		step {
			name = "Set temporary directory"
			set_attr {
				"temp_directory"
				concat {
					get_attr {"base_dir"}
					"/tmp/vfs"
				}
			}
		}
	}
	connection {
		name = "Connect to Module"
		step {
			name = "Connect to Module"
			if {
				condition = is_not_empty {get_attr {"path_from_ep"}}
				on_true = create_connection {
					connection_type = INCLUSION
					target_ci_type = ""
					entry_point_type = "u_cmdb_ci_jboss_wildfly_module_entry_point"
					attributes {
						attribute {
							name = "name"
							value = get_attr {"path_from_ep"}
						}
						attribute {
							name = "u_directory"
							value = get_attr {"temp_directory"}
						}
					}
					is_artificial = "false"
					traffic_based = "false"
				}
				on_false = nop {}
			}
		}
	}
}
</ndl><parent/><serverless>false</serverless><source/><sys_class_name>sa_pattern</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-17 15:21:20</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>211f2789786301107f444a5dfb8dfa81</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>JBoss WildFly Pattern</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sa_pattern_211f2789786301107f444a5dfb8dfa81</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-17 22:29:11</sys_updated_on><version/></sa_pattern></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: cmdb_reconciliation_definition_af0b0a57fc9b01107f44b68649840559
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="cmdb_reconciliation_definition"><cmdb_reconciliation_definition action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_to>u_cmdb_ci_jboss_wildfly_module</applies_to><attributes/><condition/><discovery_source>ServiceWatch</discovery_source><name>JBoss WildFly Module rule by ServiceWatch</name><null_update/><priority>9999</priority><sys_class_name>cmdb_reconciliation_definition</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-11 21:34:55</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>af0b0a57fc9b01107f44b68649840559</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>JBoss WildFly Module rule by ServiceWatch</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>cmdb_reconciliation_definition_af0b0a57fc9b01107f44b68649840559</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-11 21:34:55</sys_updated_on></cmdb_reconciliation_definition></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: cmdb_reconciliation_definition_3fd2061bfc5b01107f44b6864984054b
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="cmdb_reconciliation_definition"><cmdb_reconciliation_definition action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_to>u_cmdb_ci_jboss_wildfly</applies_to><attributes/><condition/><discovery_source>ServiceWatch</discovery_source><name>JBoss WildFly rule by ServiceWatch</name><null_update/><priority>9999</priority><sys_class_name>cmdb_reconciliation_definition</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-11 20:59:10</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>3fd2061bfc5b01107f44b6864984054b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>JBoss WildFly rule by ServiceWatch</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>cmdb_reconciliation_definition_3fd2061bfc5b01107f44b6864984054b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-11 20:59:10</sys_updated_on></cmdb_reconciliation_definition></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sa_pattern_c8edc11578eb01107f444a5dfb8dfaa5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sa_pattern"><sa_pattern action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><ci_type>u_cmdb_ci_jboss_wildfly_module</ci_type><cpattern_type>1</cpattern_type><description/><directory>false</directory><enforce_proc_classy>false</enforce_proc_classy><invoke_per_account>false</invoke_per_account><metadata_id>c8edc11578eb01107f444a5dfb8dfaa5</metadata_id><name>JBoss WildFly Module Pattern</name><ndl>pattern {
	metadata {
		id = "c8edc11578eb01107f444a5dfb8dfaa5"
		name = "JBoss WildFly Module Pattern"
		description = ""
		citype = "u_cmdb_ci_jboss_wildfly_module"
	}
	identification {
		name = "Identification for JBoss WildFly Module"
		entry_point {type = "u_cmdb_ci_jboss_wildfly_module_entry_point"}
		find_process_strategy {strategy = NONE}
		step {
			name = "Set name"
			set_attr {
				"name"
				get_attr {"entry_point.name"}
			}
		}
		step {
			name = "Set installation directory"
			set_attr {
				"install_directory"
				get_attr {"entry_point.u_directory"}
			}
		}
		step {
			name = "Set temp directory"
			set_attr {
				"temp_directory"
				concat {
					get_attr {"entry_point.u_directory"}
					"/temp"
				}
			}
		}
	}
	connection {
		name = "Connection Section to PostgreSQL"
		step {
			name = "Set configuration file"
			runcmd_to_var {
				cmd = concat {
					"find "
					get_attr {"temp_directory"}
					" -type f -name \""
					get_attr {"name"}
					"-ds.xml\""
				}
				execution_mode = "DEFAULT"
				var_names = "config_file"
				parsing_strategy = delimited_parsing {
					selected_positions = 1
				}
				if_not_found_do = nop {}
				cache_flag = 0
			}
		}
		step {
			name = "Set connection string"
			parse_text_file_to_var {
				file_path = get_files_by_filter {
					expression = get_attr {"config_file"}
					foreach_attribute_name = "forEach"
				}
				var_names = "connection_string"
				parsing_strategy = xml_parsing_strategy {
					rootXpath = "/datasources"
					fields {
						field {
							col_name = "connection_string"
							xpath = "/datasources/datasource/connection-url/text()"
							delimiters = ""
							position = 1
						}
						field {
							col_name = "forEach"
							for_each = "forEach"
							delimiters = ""
							position = 1
						}
					}
				}
				if_not_found_do = nop {}
				cache_flag = 0
			}
		}
		step {
			name = "Parse connection string"
			parse_var_to_var {
				from_var_name = "connection_string"
				to_var_names = table {
					name = "db_connection"
					col_names = "host","port","database"
				}
				parsing_strategy = regex_parsing {regex = ".*://([\\d\\.]+|[\\d\\w\\.-_]+):(\\d{1,4})/([\\w\\d\\.\\-\\_]+)"}
				if_not_found_do = nop {}
			}
		}
		step {
			name = "Create a connection to PostgreSQL"
			create_connection {
				connection_type = APPLICATION_FLOW
				target_ci_type = ""
				entry_point_type = "cmdb_ci_endpoint_postgresql"
				attributes {
					attribute {
						name = "host"
						value = get_attr {"db_connection[*].host"}
					}
					attribute {
						name = "instance"
						value = get_attr {"db_connection[*].database"}
					}
					attribute {
						name = "port"
						value = get_attr {"db_connection[*].port"}
					}
				}
				is_artificial = "false"
				traffic_based = "false"
			}
		}
	}
}
</ndl><parent/><serverless>false</serverless><source/><sys_class_name>sa_pattern</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-17 22:15:28</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c8edc11578eb01107f444a5dfb8dfaa5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>JBoss WildFly Module Pattern</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sa_pattern_c8edc11578eb01107f444a5dfb8dfaa5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-18 14:22:39</sys_updated_on><version/></sa_pattern></record_update>
